title: How Federal, Equitas Small Finance, RBL and SBM Bank India are riding the bank-fintech partnership wave - Moneycontrol
content: How Federal, Equitas Small Finance, RBL and SBM Bank India are riding the bank-fintech partnership wave  Moneycontrol
description: These banks are expanding their digital presence with a branch-lite, distribution heavy model. With a strong digital presence through fintechs, the banks are looking to serve the next set of digital customers.
